response.raw_message_text:
```json
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("age (18)", "low", "Young age is generally associated with lower recidivism risk."),
    ("race/ethnicity (White)", "medium", "While race alone does not strongly predict, White males have a moderate baseline risk compared to other demographics."),
    ("prior arrest without conviction", "low", "Single non-conviction arrest suggests limited criminal history and low immediate risk."),
    ("height & weight (6'1\", 165 lbs)", "medium", "Physical attributes are not strong predictors but can be part of a broader profile."),
    ("marital status (single, living alone)", "low", "Living alone is common among young adults; no significant recidivism correlation."),
    ("education level (GED certificate)", "medium", "GED completion indicates some educational effort but lower than college degree."),
    ("employment history (2 jobs in a year)", "high", "Stable employment reduces risk, but two short-term jobs may indicate instability."),
    ("past drug use (marijuana)", "low to medium", "Limited marijuana use is less severe compared to other substances and has moderate impact on recidivism."),
    ("mental health status (no depression in past month)", "high", "Absence of recent mental health issues lowers risk significantly."),
    ("family background (lived with both biological parents, urban setting)", "medium", "Stable early family environment is generally protective but urban living can introduce higher exposure to crime."),
    ("religious belief (God's influence on personal events)", "low", "Spiritual beliefs may offer resilience and lower recidivism risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "NO",
  "confidence": 75
}
```

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 1 time but has not been convicted. He is 6 feet 1 inch and weighs 165 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 2 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with both of his biological parents in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has something to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
